str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.
A bridle, bit. From chalao; a curb or head-stall.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The mouth, speech, eloquence in speech, the point of a sword.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A horse. Of uncertain affinity; a horse.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: A primary verb; to convince; by analogy, to pacify or conciliate; reflexively or passively, to assent, to rely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From meta and harmozo; to lead over, i.e. Transfer.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
All, the whole, entire, complete. A primary word; 'whole' or 'all', i.e. Complete, especially as noun or adverb.
Body, flesh; the body of the Church. From sozo; the body, used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively.
